scripts.build: npm run compile && cd .. && npm run compile && npm run build:webview
scripts.cli: npm run compile && npx dotenvx run -f .env.local -- tsx src/cli.ts
scripts.clean:exercises: cd exercises && git checkout -f && git clean -fd
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:cli: docker exec -it -w /home/vscode/repo/benchmark $(docker ps --filter "ancestor=roo-code-benchmark" -q) xvfb-run npm run cli --
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:rm
